body:
This PR triggers all automated agents to verify the system is working correctly.

## What This Tests

- âœ… GitHub webhook signature verification
- âœ… Agent invocation (5 agents in parallel)
- âœ… Claude API integration
- âœ… GitHub PR comment posting
- âœ… Slack notification
- âœ… Error handling and resilience

## Expected Results

1. PR comment with agent findings (within 5-15 seconds)
2. Slack notification in #all-engineering-automation
3. Render backend logs showing agent execution
4. GitHub webhook delivery logs showing 202 Accepted

## Agents Being Tested

- Backend Engineer: Code review, API design, database optimization
- Senior Frontend Engineer: Component architecture, performance
- Security Analyst: Vulnerability assessment, OWASP compliance
- Design Review: UI/UX consistency, accessibility
- QA Testing: Test coverage, edge cases

Please wait 10-15 seconds for agents to complete, then check PR comments.
head: test/agent-automation-verification
